product.product_title: Converse Unisex Adult Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top Sneaker
product.cushioning: Lightly padded insole and cotton canvas lining offer basic, traditional comfort.
product.breathability: Classic canvas upper provides moderate, natural breathability.
product.short_description: Step into an icon of global style with the Converse Unisex Adult Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top Sneaker. For over a century, the Chuck Taylor All Star has transcended its basketball court origins to become one of the most recognizable and beloved sneakers in the world. This classic low-top silhouette features a simple, durable canvas upper that provides a lightweight, breathable fit. Its timeless, minimalist design is a blank canvas for self-expression, pairing effortlessly with everything from jeans and shorts to dresses and skirts, making it a true wardrobe staple for all ages and styles. The signature details include the rubber toe cap, vulcanized rubber sole for flexibility and traction, and the iconic All Star ankle patch. A cotton canvas lining provides added comfort. Please note that this style is known to run large; it is often recommended to order a half size down from your usual size for the best fit. Own a piece of history with the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star.
product.about_this_item: ? Canvas upper for classic Chucks look & feel ? OrthoLite cushioning for optimal comfort ? Diamond-pattern rubber outsole ? Iconic All Star license plate
product.primary_keyword: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top Optical White
